name: Mouse Survival: Rescue to the HOLES!
name_original: Mouse Survival: Rescue to the HOLES!
description:
This game was made für Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1 with the Theme: Holes!

You play a little mouse, that is hungry for tasty cheese! If you don't eat enough, you might starve...

But it's not so easy. Beware of the cute cats! They also like to eat little mice like you! To hide from them, there are many places to hide like secure HOLES in the interiors.

Controls:

WASD or ARROW KEYS for Movement

SPACE for Jump

MOUSE for Camera look

ESC for Pause Menu

All programming, design, 2D and 3D Art, Sounds was made by me and a friend (who wants no itch account, so can't contribute his name here).

Only two free assets from the Untiy Assetstore were used:

Casual Game BGM #5 for Background Music
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/casual-game-bgm-5-135943

Lowpoly Toon Cat Lite  for the dangerous cute looking cats!
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/lowpoly-toon-cat-lit...
